Html: I finished reading the book about a week or two ago, and I'm working on my first project using prism. I've been keeping a running list of questions and other issues with the book. I was wondering where can I interact with the authors of the book and share my questions and comments?

Hi,

If you have any question regarding Prism, please feel free to post them in this forum; we will try to help you with any doubt you might have and provide guidance when possible.

Also, any comment regarding the Prism book will be welcome as it may be useful for both the Prism team and the community.

As a side note, you might also want to check the online version of the Prism documentation, since there may be some differences between the printed and the online version:

  • Prism 4 Documentation on MSDN

Regards,

Damian Cherubini
